headline: Show HN: I Created a Chrome Extension for PG: TRAB (Tweet Reporter and Blocker)
description:
A few days ago I saw this tweet from PG: https://twitter.com/paulg/status/1496549841912094733 ...and guessed it shouldn't be too hard to make a chrome extension to do this (I had never made a chrome extension before)

So I took a stab at it - took me a bit over a day to make it, and it was fun to put together.

I responded to his tweet with the link to the extension but I'm not sure if he would've seen it.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 我为PG创建了一个Chrome扩展：TRAB（Tweet Reporter and Blocker）。
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 我為PG創建了一個Chrome擴展：TRAB（Tweet Reporter and Blocker）。
description_zh-Hans:
几天前我看到PG的这条推文：https://twitter.com/paulg/status/1496549841912094733。 ......我猜想，做一个chrome扩展来做这个应该不难（我以前从来没有做过chrome扩展）

于是我就试了一下--花了一天多时间做出来，而且做起来很有趣。

我在他的推特上回复了扩展的链接，但我不确定他是否会看到。
description_zh-Hant:
幾天前我看到PG的這條推文：https://twitter.com/paulg/status/1496549841912094733。 ......我猜想，做一個chrome擴展來做這個應該不難（我以前從來沒有做過chrome擴展）

於是我就試了一下--花了一天多時間做出來，而且做起來很有趣。

我在他的推特上回復了擴展的鏈接，但我不確定他是否會看到。
